## CLIConfigurationSpec.saveInputRequestBody property

Whether to save the content of the input request body when creating a new mock.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly saveInputRequestBody?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

The default value of the global `saveInputRequestBody` setting is `true`<!-- -->.

It can be changed at request level in the [hook](./kassette.configurationspec.hook.md) method through [mock.setSaveInputRequestBody](./kassette.imock.setsaveinputrequestbody.md)<!-- -->.
